item.title: 提交内核patch
item.author: yuanye.ma@qq.com (Yuanye Ma)
item.description: 提交kernel patch 创建工作分支 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 # 添加linux-next远程分支 git remote add linux-next https://git.kernel.org/pub/scm/linux/kernel/git/next/linux-next.git git fetch --tags linux-next # 基于next-20210112标签创建工
